blocks.content:
# Welcome to the Dynatrace Mobile Observability Onboarding Launchpad
This launchpad is designed to help mobile teams quickly adopt Dynatrace for end-to-end monitoring of their applications. It provides a clear path from initial setup to advanced insights, ensuring you can deliver exceptional user experiences and maintain app performance at scale. By leveraging Dynatrace’s powerful capabilities—such as crash analytics, session replay, and distributed tracing.

You’ll gain real-time visibility into every user interaction, reduce troubleshooting time, and optimize your mobile KPIs. Whether you’re a developer, QA engineer, or product owner, this launchpad equips you with the resources and best practices to unlock the full value of [Mobile Observability](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/mobile-applications-landing)!
### Explore our Dynatrace University courses and YouTube playlists to help you getting started

content.title: Dynatrace Essentials: Digital Experience Monitoring
content.description: Explore the concept of user monitoring with a specific focus on how Dynatrace captures data directly from a user’s browser or mobile device.

blocks.content: ### Explore sample use cases via our Dynatrace Blog posts

content.title: Best practices and Key metrics for improving mobile performance
content.description: Why observability matters for Mobile App performance.

content.title: Dynatrace Session Replay for Mobile Apps

blocks.content:
### Documentation
--- 
 
Explore official Dynatrace documentation to access detailed guidance on instrumenting Android and iOS Mobile Apps, hybrid apps, and cross-platform frameworks, as well as how to analyse and use RUM data.
[Mobile Applications Hub](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/mobile-applications-landing)
* Begin your journey at the documentation hub for Mobile Application Observability. From there you can drill into what matters to you!
* [Instrument Android Apps](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/android-hub)
  * Learn how to instrument your Android mobile apps using the Dynatrace Android Gradle plugin and OneAgent SDK.
* [Instrument iOS Apps](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/ios-hub)
  * Learn how to instrument your iOS Apps, including SwiftUI controls.
* [Instrument Hybrid Apps](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/instrument-hybrid-app)
  * Learn how to Instrument your Hrbid and cross-platform Apps.
* [User Session Analysis](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/user-session-analysis-new)
  * Dynatrace user session analysis enables you to slice, dice, and combine your application's user sessions into meaningful segments based on shared characteristics of individual user sessions—operating system, browser type, location, or user tag
* [Troubleshooting RUM for Mobile Applications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/troubleshooting-mobile-subsection)
  * Find out how to solve problems related to mobile application monitoring.
* [Configure data privacy settings for Mobile Applications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/configure-rum-privacy-mobile)
  * For many companies, ensuring the privacy of their customers' personal data is an important component of the digital business success. Dynatrace provides numerous privacy enhancements that you can use to configure the data privacy settings of your apps.

content.title: Mobile
content.description: View your instrumented Mobile Application Performance

content.title: Session Segmentation
content.description: View and analyse captured user sessions for your Mobile Apps.

content.title: Query User Sessions
content.description: Use uSQL to query captured user sessions based on custom criteria

content.title: Problems
content.description: View, analyse and manage ongoing problems in your environment.

content.title: Dashboards
content.description: Create and view dashboards tailored to you and your teams needs.

blocks.content:
### Frequently Asked Questions
**What do I do if I need help managing my Dynatrace environment?**
* There are numerous support resources available to all Dynatrace users. Select the "Support" button in the bottom left of the navigation menu to access all our available support resources including:
  * Support Center
  * Documentation
  * Community
  * University
  * Support Tickets
* We also have a dedicated in-product chat team who can assist you
  * The in product chat is available 24/7 for existing Enterprise Success and Support customers. For standard customers the chat is only available during business hours.
